persona.title: Internal Project Team Member
persona.description: This anchor describes communication with colleagues within the same organization, specifically those involved in a shared project. They are familiar with internal processes and the specifics of this project, and communication should be clear, collaborative, and focused on task execution and project progress.

situation.title: Internal Project Status and Action
situation.description: This message provides an update on the adada project's progress, highlighting key achievements or challenges as of June 26, 2025. It includes a specific request for action or information from the internal team to keep the project on track and meet shared deadlines.
